title: E-Learning Practical Skills Enhancement: Simulation-Based Work for Strategic E-Learning Planning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Explain the three strategic dimensions (strategic orientation, analysis, and selection) for transitioning to e-learning
Evaluate the success factors of e-learning (individual, environmental, and system dimensions) and propose improvement strategies
Design data collection procedures for e-learning strategic planning using survey and interview techniques
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
